'except Exception:'
'print("Creating a new cpu compute target ... ")'
"# Let's create the Azure ML compute oject with the intended parameters"
'cpu_cluster = AmlCompute('
'name=cpu_compute_target,'
'# Azure ML Compute is the on-demand VM service'
'type="am1compute",'
'# VM Family'
'size="STANDARD_DS3_V2"'
'# Minimum running nodes when there is no jo running'
'min_instances=0,'
'# Nodes in cluster'
'max_instances=4,'
'# How many seconds will the node running after the jo termination'
'idle_time_efore_scale_down=180,'
'# Dedicated or LowPriority. The latter is cheaper ut there is a'
